newsitem.title: GERMANY: Augsburg adds Lufthansa code-share flights.
newsitem.headline: Augsburg adds Lufthansa code-share flights.

text.p: Augsburg Airways said it will expand its franchise operation with Deutsche Lufthansa AG to two more routes from March 31.
The regional airline will operate its existing three times a day Augsburg to Duesseldorf and to Cologne services as Lufthansa code-share services, a statement said.
These will act as feeder flights into European and intercontinental Lufthansa flights from the two airports, the airline said.
Augsburg Airways already flies four daily services between Augsburg and Frankfurt in the Team Lufthansa franchise colours.
It also has Lufthansa code-share flights from Munich to Dortmund, Elba, Erfurt, Leipzig, Paderborn, St Tropez and Turin.
